message.body: Hey next weekend I want to go to New York to the Charles James exhibit at the Met. I'm trying to plan out my well and sleeping arrangements. Would it be
York?

Hey next weekend I want to go to New York to the Charles James exhibit at the Met. I'm trying to plan out my well and sleeping arrangements. Would it be possible for me and my coworker Stacy to stay at your house Friday night maybe Next week and then Saturday morning we can just get up and drive to New York?
Hey!
I don't think the whole message sent
I'm trying to avoid paying for a hotel in New York if I can
Awesome, thank you so much. Just trying to plan everything out. We were going to take the train but its $175 per person. Yikes
Of course! We have a pull out down stairs and the studio.
Yeah it's so expensive. I'm trying to go to moms at some point but not sure which days yet. I'll try to plan around next Friday though. Would be nice to see ya!
You can ride w me either way if you want
I think I have to go eRlier. School starts back up the 25th and I have meetings the week before. I have off august 3-19th though so I should be able to get up there
Why is he taking you to court???
He wants to "reduce" his support payment
Oh god.
Exactly
Thats why in going w a file of documents. Im fed up.
He needs to support his kids
Have you heard about the position yet?
Ugh all kinds of stuff happened this weekend. Doesn't look great but now I have to apply in a national search, which wasn't the case before
Oh man :( well if it doesnt happen then it wasnt meant to be
Dont get discouraged
Yeah its okay. I'm just ready for a vacation!
You should go somewhere fun
I want to go to a spa.
Ahhhhhh a spa. That sounds nice
But I'll probably just go to Vermont. The opposite of a spa
